dialogue.speaker: Factory
dialogue.text: Attention, all units. Threat detected. Security Procedures Activated.

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Ah, that's better. Connection established. Handshake complete. Message follows:

dialogue.speaker: Unknown
dialogue.text: Come to us. We have what you desire. You can pause by pressing 'Enter'. End of Message.

dialogue.speaker: Factory
dialogue.text: -be eliminated. Continue working. End of Message.
